item.description:
Agenda:

  • Social Gathering, Pizza and Snacks
  • Watch "The Gamers" (more info at http://gamers.deadgen...
  • Commemorate the loss of one of the Father's of Role-Playing, Gary Gygax, who died this month.
  • Bid Farewell to Jonas who's leaving the Greater Boston area
  • If there is interested we can run a short game such as Universalis


Administrativa:

  • Welcome Message on Wiki
  • Homebrew System, Game Design Collaboration
  • Potentially have Vincent Baker (Author of "Dogs in the Vinyard" as Guest at our next Gathering
  • Suggestions to encourage new/more Games to be posted and to utilize the meetup group better
  • Is there interest in a Coffee meeting, to simple chat aout our latest adventures?
  • Gaming Locations (Pandemonium, Compleat Strategist, ...), maybe we can leaverage the group to get better times/deals in exchange for marketing...
  • What type of events should be on the schedule (one-shots, campaigns, conventions, ...
  • Suggestions/Request for new events:
    Systems: TORG, Hero, D&D, Universalis, Moirae (Christian's Homebrew), Chivarly & Sorcery, Harnmaster, Riddle of Steel, GURPS
    Campaigns: Astra et Umbra Campaign, Medieval D&D Campaign
  • Recruiting for Medieval D&D campaign


Once again a warm welcome to all our new members.
Hope to see many of you there, especially the ones we haven't met yet.

To make it even more enticing, there will be raffle to win some Role-Playing Books or Graphic Novels.
Three lucky winners can take their selection of the following:

- "The Hedge Knight" by George R.R. Martin
- Pendragon - Book of Knights
- MERP - Whoses of the black woods
- MERP - Thieves of Tharbad
- MERS - Fluch ueber dem Ered Nimrais
- MERS - Die Diebe von Tharbad
- MERS - Mord in Dol Amroth
- MERP - Hillman of the Trollshaws
- SpaceMaster - Raiders from the Frontier
- RoleMaster - Black Ops
- RoleMaster - Pulp Adventures

Your friendly organizer and GameMaster

Christian
item.name: March Fellowship Gathering
